description:
One gloomy Monday morning, Keima`s sour mood is exacerbated by harsh words from Chihiro.
Keima doesn`t give a damn about the real world, but her words still leave him a little depressed. However, he brushes them off as the ramblings of a background character...but then they discover that she`s been possessed by a loose soul!
And Chihiro`s parameters are the worst Keima`s seen so far...
Keima is beaten down by the ordinary girl who exemplifies the real girl.
That is when a certain someone appears before him—!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Always Rains at the End of a Hard Journey
たどりついたらいつも雨ふり
